body:
Heyo People Of Avicus Forums!

New Topic: Pet Peeves! 

Rules: 
1. If You Have A Pet Peeve About Someone : Do Not Mention Their Name! Its Rude! 
2. If Someone Mentions Something Your Fond Of Don't Get Pissed! This Is An Opinion And Should Not Deserve Hate!
3. Try To Put Down Your Pet Peeve In A Way People Will Not Take It Offensively... So All This Really Means Is Use Proper Grammar Or Don't Give Mix Messages!
4. Be Mature, Don't Turn This Into A Sick/Gross Discussion.. 
5. Pet Peeves Can Be About Mostly Everything! From Sports, People Things Say (Remember Though Don't Say Names), Pets, Foods Etc.

I'll Start! Frosted's Pet Peeves:

1. When People Overuse Words - This Really Pisses Me Off.. When People Keep Using One Word In Everything They Say! D: "Example - LOL What! Whoa Thats So LOL! HAHA LOL Your Funny LOL... Etc."

2. When People Overestimate Themselves - I Give A Point To People Who Try, But Acting Like You Can Do Everything Is Just Annoying

3. When Ponies Are Stubborn - I Have No Idea If There Are Any Fellow Horseback Riders Out There But My Riding Pet Peeve Is When Ponies Are Extremely Stubborn!

4. Friends That Embarrass You In Public - Admit It Mostly All Of Us Have That One Or Few Friends That Embarrass You In Public.. I Hate Whenever This Happens

5. Unorganized Places/Rooms/Desks Etc. - I Have To Admit, I Was Raised To Clean Up And Organize Everything... I Just Can't Take Messy Places.. Though Sometimes I'm Messy Just Because I'm Too Lazy To Sort/Organize The Things Or Whatever. Why Does It Take Longer To Clean Then To Make Stuff Messy?! 

Okay Those Are Some Of My Pet Peeves! Now I'd Like To Hear Some Of Your Guys's Pet Peeves!

- FrostedCupcakez AKA "FrostyLeSnowman" -Sethskye

title: Pet Peeves!

replies.body:
1. Cocky people. Agreed.
2. People who get butthurt over swearing. Seriously, if you want me to stop swearing then go camp out in the cursing forbidden channel.
3. People who bash staff when they have NO IDEA what's going on 99% of the time.
replies.body_tagged:
1. Cocky people. Agreed.
2. People who get butthurt over swearing. Seriously, if you want me to stop swearing then go camp out in the cursing forbidden channel.
3. People who bash staff when they have NO IDEA what's going on 99% of the time.

replies.body:
1. Posers. Guys who talk the talk but can't walk the walk. People who get overconfident fail to realize that anything can happen no matter how set an outcome seems.

2. Ignorant People. Seriously guys read the damn forums once in a blue moon. If you don't know what people are talking about, don't try to correct them or try to make yourself look better by trying to be the authority on something you know aboslutely nothing about.

3. Racists/Sexists/Homophobes/Any person with a preconceived notion of "normal".
Everyone is special and bashing people because of how they are different in whatever form is idiotic, base, nonsensical, and a blatant attempt to make someone with a low self esteem look better at themselves.

And most importantly...
4. Dem boys who be hatin' on my boy Ralphie!
#RalphieRage2014

replies.body:
I hate when people want to fight me at school or something, and they slap me (I want to be hit first). Then I'm all like "Okay, you hit me, lez do dis." Then when I go hit, they all chicken out. -_- Like make up your mind, hit and be hit, or talk and be talked to.

People chewing with their mouths open, or licking their fingers IN PUBLIC. Like nobody wants to see you do that, do it at home. Why? Because if you licked your fingers, you are going to touch stuff. No one wants your tongue germs on stuff.

People breaking the rules, then being all devensive when I say something. Earlier today in Nebula, someone was spamming profanity, and I said "swearing is prohibited, do not swear or you'll get punished, and that jerk said "Whatever, HoboMommy, you little sl*t" and a lot of words they shouldn't know.
